alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 26 at 4:17AM PDT until October 27 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures around 30 possible. * WHERE...Willapa Hills, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills
